game.name: Dark Ninja
game.description:
It is time to dive into the extremely entertaining and addictive adventure of your life! Your favourite character ninja needs your help to run over the platforms that are packed with unlimited obstacles. Would you like to join him and show off the world that you are the biggest fan of ninja? Give Dark Ninja a try and be prepared to practice the best ninja techniques in your own way! Your objective is to destroy all of the red colour ninjas.

Remember these red ninjas are very dangerous and will keep attacking you until you are into their contact. Try to grab as many coins as possible to improve your score in this HTML5 platform game! Use your skills to wreak havoc upon your horde of deadly enemies! Get ready to guide your character to defend any person who will try to stand before him! You are playing the role of black ninjas, while your enemies will be the red ninjas.

Make sure to jump around to keep your character away from the attacks of ruthless red ninjas. Throw shurikens at your enemies to teach them a true lesson in this cool platformer game! Try not to be caught in the strikes of your enemies otherwise you will lose your health! The top left corner of the screen will show your health bar. Do not forget to heal your character by collecting red potions in case your health is low. Feel free to defeat multiple enemies at once by using the special attacks! Play free adventure games for boys and have a blast online with your friends, no download required!

game.webControlKeys: Z,S1,S2 ICONS TO DISAPPIER,LEFT ARROWS AND UP L-R ARROWS TO MOVE,RIGHT ICONS-PARASHOOT,HIT,DISAPPER
